other_tests.findings: Confirmed adenocarcinoma in the gastric antrum.

other_tests.procedure_name: subtotal gastrectomy with Billroth I reconstruction
other_tests.findings: No visible evidence of peritoneal metastases. Surgical margins are described as negative, except for some atypical cells seen in perigastric fat which are morphologically different from the high-grade cytology.
Cycle 1 of chemotherapy with epirubicin, cisplatin, and capecitabine initiated.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stopped capecitabine early due to grade 4 thrombocytopenia without bleeding.

other_tests.findings: Began chemoradiation with capecitabine 1000 mg PO BID as a radiosensitizer. Completed 45 Gy.
